content.text:
Simple Python check - just for HEARTBEAT.md:

```python
import os

# Check common variations
paths = [
    '/root/clawd/HEARTBEAT.md',
    '/root/clawd/Heartbeat.md',  
    '/root/clawd/heartbeat.md',
    '/root/clawd/HEARTBEAT',
    '/root/clawd/heart',
]

print("CHECKING HEARTBEAT FILE VARIATIONS:")
for path in paths:
    exists = os.path.exists(path)
    if exists:
        print(f"  FOUND: {path}")
    else:
        print(f"  NOT FOUND: {path}")
```

This will check all common variations. Quick output only.

content.text:
```python
import os

paths = [
    '/root/clawd/HEARTBEAT.md',
    '/root/clawd/Heartbeat.md',  
    '/root/clawd/heartbeat.md',
    '/root/clawd/HEARTBEAT',
    '/root/clawd/heart',
]

print("CHECKING HEARTBEAT FILE VARIATIONS:")
for path in paths:
    exists = os.path.exists(path)
    if exists:
        print(f"  FOUND: {path}")
    else:
        print(f"  NOT FOUND: {path}")
```
